title: 75: Alex's Drug Connections Intensify
description:
There are now three people that the state is trying to tie to Alex Murdaugh and his alleged drug dealing. The NY Post brings the Walterboro Cowboys gang back up in the conversation.
Our legal analyst, John Snyder, joins us to talk about the latest in the Mallory Beach boating fatality.
He walks us through the details from A Wall Street Journal article written by Valerie Bauerlein
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
